ygData.subject: RE: Am I on crack?
ygData.msgSnippet: No, it was to defend against magic=) well, I guess technically it would be used against casters ... From: Stephen E. McCloskey [mailto:s.mccloskey@intest.com]
ygData.messageBody:
No, it was to defend against magic=) well, I guess technically it would be
used against casters

-----Original Message-----
From: Stephen E. McCloskey [mailto:s.mccloskey@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 15, 2000 9:28 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Am I on crack?


From: "Stephen E. McCloskey" <s.mccloskey@...>

I thought I remembered at least two months ago that GZ said he was going to
release a song to us bards "soon", before the expansion. He said, "I
really like this song and I am curious to see how you will use it" and "to
be used against casters".

Am I on crack and imagining this or what? Did I miss something?

Disclaimer: Don't do drugs. Mr. Mackey says, "Drug...drugs are bad,
mmmmkay. And if you do drugs then...then your bad, so don't do drugs,
mmmmkay."
